name: Free Fall (RUShunter)
description:
How to escape a labyrinth if you can't move on your own? Move the labyrinth itself!

This game was made for Weekly Game Jam #186 "Alternate Perspectives".

There are still some issues with physics and collisions. Unfortunately I couldn't solve them. Good news are that they don't break the game, you can restart level anyway.

My English is not perfect, so please let me know in comments if you'll find any grammar mistakes or typos.

Controls:

  • Q/E - rotate room at 90 degrees counterclockwise/clockwise
  • W - rotate room at 180 degrees
  • R - restart level
  • Space - skip intermission
  • Esc (hold) - quit to main menu

Used tools:

  • Godot Engine
  • Inkscape
  • Bfxr
  • Bosca Ceoil
  • Audacity
